title: Twitter : number of monthly active users 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monthly active users in millions
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly active users in millions for 37 number of Quarters.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The maximum Quarter Q1 '18 has got 11.2 times higher Number of monthly active users in millions than the minimum Quarter Q1 '10.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly active users in millions for 37 number of Quarters.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of monthly active users in millions for 37 number of Quarters.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
The maximum Quarter Q1 '18 has got 11.2 times higher Number of monthly active users in millions than the minimum Quarter Q1 '10.
max_summary: This bar chart has 37 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Number of monthly active users in millions 336.0 is found at Quarter Q1 '18 and the minimum is found at Q1 '10 where Quarter is 30.0.
Second maximum Number of monthly active users in millions is found at Quarter Q2 '18.
The difference of Number of monthly active users in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 306.0.
Quarter Q1 '18 is higher than any other Quarters with value 336.0, followed by Q2 '18, and Q3 '17. Down to Quarter Q1 '10 with the lowest value 30.0.
The Number of monthly active users in millions has lowered over the past 37 Quarters.
Quarter Q1 '19, Q4 '17, and Q3 '17 share the same value 330.0.
The lowest value 30.0 at Q1 '10 is almost 1.44 times smaller than the average value 232.83.
